title: Landes
extract:
Landes is in south-western France, a department of Nouvelle-Aquitaine.


Cities

1 Mont-de-Marsan — sunny southwestern town, perfect for accessing the forest of Landes.
2 Aire-sur-l'Adour
3 Biscarrosse
4 Capbreton 
5 Dax 
6 Léon
7 Mimizan
8 Saint-Paul-lès-Dax
9 Saint-Sever


Other destinations
1 Contis lighthouse (Phare de Contis).  (updated Nov 2019)
 Sémaphore de Messanges.  (updated Nov 2019)


Understand


Get in


Get around


See


Do
Bicycle riding: there are many kilometers of flat trails through the pine forests
Sun-bathing, swimming: many beaches from crowded to isolated await you
Camping: Landes is a favorite camping destination with more than 100 campgrounds from 1-star to 4-star available
Surfing: Landes is home of some of the best surfing spots not only in Europe but the World. In September surfing Professionals meet in Hossegor for the Quik Pro France


Eat


Drink


Stay safe
Be careful when you spend a night at the gas stations along the main freeway.


Go next
